content: पातालं [पतत्यस्मिन्नधर्मेण पत्-आलञ्; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 1. 114</ls>] {@--1@} The last of the seven regions or worlds under the earth, said to be peopled by Nāgas; the seven regions are:-- अतल. वितल, सुतल, रसातल, तलातल, महातल, and पाताल. {@--2@} The lower regions or world in general; <ls>R. 15. 84</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 80.</ls> {@--3@} An excavation, a hole. {@--4@} Submarine fire. {@--5@} (In <ab>astrol.</ab>) The fourth house or sign from that in which the sun is present. --लः {@--1@} A kind of instrument for distillation or the calcination and sublimation of metals. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Jupiter's year (of 361 days).
